arts.ttl: Tenacious performance allows Heidenheim fairytale European debut
arts.sum: A penalty rebound goal from teenager Paul Wanner proved to be the difference for FCH, who made history by securing victory in their first ever European group stage match.

It is the sixth round of Bundesliga action between Friday and Sunday and with the October international break looming, Jack Ogalbe is backing leaders Bayern Munich to improve their position, and in style, when they head to second-placed Eintracht Frankfurt.

arts.ttl: Heidenheim vs. Olimpija Ljubljana preview: Team news and predicted lineups

arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Thursday's Europa Conference League clash between Heidenheim and NK Olimpija Ljubljana, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
